faqs.question: How do I get from the airport/railway station to the retreat?
faqs.answer: Book your flights to Dehradun Airport (DED). From Delhi, you can take a taxi, bus,  to reach Chamba. The distance from Dehradun to Shivoham Yoga Meditation and inner Engg. Chamba is around 100kms

faqs.question: How do I get from the bus to the retreat?
faqs.answer: Buses to Chamba leave New Delhi every hour from the Kashmiri Gate National Bus Stand. The bus travel takes around 7-8 hours and costs approximately ₹500-600 for air-conditioned buses.

faqs.question: How is the weather in Chamba during the retreat?
faqs.answer: In January and February, the weather in Chamba is usually around 8 degrees Celsius.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden fees or charges?
faqs.answer: No, we believe in transparent pricing. The price you see on the retreat page is the price you pay. There are no hidden fees or surprise charges.

faqs.question: Can I speak to someone before booking?
faqs.answer: Of course! Our team is available daily from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM via call at +91-8800882664 or +91-8875075432, and via email at retreat@ritanveshi.org, to answer any questions and guide you through the booking process.

faqs.question: Is this retreat suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely! Our retreat is planned to accommodate participants of all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners. Whether you are new to yoga or have an established practice, our experienced instructors will guide you through each session, ensuring that you feel comfortable and supported.

faqs.question: What should I bring to the retreat?
faqs.answer:
Please bring the following items:
- Comfortable yoga clothes and activewear.
- A yoga mat (if you don’t have one, please let us know, and we will provide one).
- A water bottle to stay hydrated.
- A journal for reflection.
- Personal toiletries and any other items you may need for a comfortable stay.
- If you plan on attending outdoor activities, bring appropriate footwear and warm clothing.

faqs.question: Is airport pickup and drop-off included in the package?
faqs.answer: No, but we have set up a travel desk that can facilitate airport pickup and drop-off at a reasonable additional cost.

faqs.question: Can I come alone, or do I need to bring a partner?
faqs.answer: You can come alone! Many of our guests attend solo to deepen their practice, experience self-growth, and connect with like-minded individuals. Our retreat offers a welcoming and supportive community for all participants, whether solo travelers or those coming with friends, colleagues, or family.
